Description: Limestone ostracon. 12 lines of text on recto and 13 lines on verso containing an administrative document.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably on the Excavation 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (146-152, pl.13)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82878) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82878)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 12 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
